alert.note: Alert for Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Houston, southwestern Miller, northwestern Seminole and southwestern Early Counties through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 356 PM EDT/256 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Donalsonville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Jakin, Saffold, Killarney, Howards Mill, Enterprise, Cedar Springs, Mayhaw and Sawhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
